short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Screentime by Ligzer - Track and limit your screen time, block distractions, and crush your to-do list like a boss!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Master your online time management with Screentime by Ligzer. This extension empowers you to monitor your website usage, block distractions, and establish intentional time limits. Whether you are working or studying, it assists you in optimizing your online habits.

Key Features:

- Comprehensive Screen Time Tracking: Gain a detailed analysis of your online activities.
- Website Blocking and Time Limits: Implement specific website restrictions or set daily time limits.
- Detailed Reports: Monitor your progress and make adjustments to enhance productivity.

Embark on your productivity journey with Screentime by Ligzer.
